:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (40MHz chan.), :• '''600''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''4800 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|4-Radio Reconfigurable Wide Coverage Indoor Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.everestnetworks.com/ap1004wri}} The [[Tembo TRM989DB]] radio serves as the 2.4GHz bgn radio :and also scans for available 5GHz DFS channels. ===See also=== *[[Everest Networks AP1002We]] • [https://www.everestnetworks.com/ap1002we PPage] *[[Everest Networks AP1004NRe]] • [https://www.everestnetworks.com/ap1004nre PPage] *[[Everest Networks AP1004WRe]] • [https://www.everestnetworks.com/ap1004wre PPage] *[[Everest Networks AP1004WRi]] • [https://www.everestnetworks.com/ap1004wri PPage] __NOTOC__
